mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Reads his essays with pleasure; as author of essay on architecture, Tucker would enjoy seeing buildings at University here; self would be pleased to accompany him there; invites him to visit self at Poplar Forest in October or November.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826--Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1822 August 24, Monticello, [Albemarle County, Virginia], to George Tucker, n.p.
